p:
When a parturient desaturates, there are multiple etiopathologies: infective (pneumonia with or without COVID-19), inflammatory (systemic inflammatory response syndrome), cardiogenic (peripartum cardiomyopathy, viral myocarditis), and noncardiogenic pulmonary edema (hypertensive and nonhypertensive pulmonary edema).
43 A stepwise approach for systematic management of the acutely ill parturient is detailed ( Figure 3 ).
